page.title: 10LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Broughton Astley has a local newspaper which is published monthly. It is called {MAINSTREAM.}The paper is free and it is delivered by volunteers, usually from Thomas Estley Community College. News is sent in to the editor,{ {Mrs.Cave,}who has worked on the paper for one year.No reporters are needed. The paper is financed by advertisements placed by local firms. The number of articles which appear varies each month although usually there are about forty.The articles are written about things of interest to the community,and also about future events.Items which have made headlines in June 1985 are the retirement of the school caretaker{Mr.Leavis; the {Domesday Project; village carnival. {
